title: $:/plugins/xp/rivers
author: xp
name: Rivers
description: Add a second column to a TiddlyWiki layout using the default layout
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://giffmex.org/stroll/stroll.html#%24%3A%2Fplugins%2Fsq%2FStories">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="https://giffmex.org/stroll/stroll.html#%24%3A%2Fplugins%2Fsq%2FStories"/> ; Rivers : Tiddler can swim in two rivers (two-column mode) : 条目可以在两条河里游动（双栏模式）
This is a custom modification of the [[Stories(v1.0.3)|https://giffmex.org/stroll/stroll.html#%24%3A%2Fplugins%2Fsq%2FStories]] plugin. Changed the plugin name to differentiate.
